```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggfortify)
```

```{r fortify.forecast, cache = TRUE}
d.arima <- forecast::auto.arima(AirPassengers)
d.forecast <- forecast::forecast(d.arima, level = c(95), h = 50)
fortify(d.forecast)
fortify(d.forecast, ts.connect = TRUE)



```
